name: WarioWare D.I.Y. Microgame File
summary: A MIO file is a game data file used by WarioWare D.I.Y., also known as Made in Ore (MIO) in Japan, a Nintendo DS game used to design microgames that can be played by other gamers. It is stored in WarioWare D.I.Y. .SAV files and contains a microgame, which may also include game records or comics.
